```{r,include=FALSE}
library(openMSE)
printDesc <- function(slot, class="Stock") {
  Desc <- get(paste0(class, "Description"))
  Desc$Description[which(Desc$Slot == slot)]
}
```

### maxage 
`r printDesc("maxage")`

### M 
`r printDesc("M")`

### Msd
`r printDesc("Msd")` 

### Fdisc
`r printDesc("Fdisc")`
